titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to permit border States to designate certain funds for border infrastructure projects, and for other purposes.
To amend title 23, United States Code, to permit border States to designate certain funds for border infrastructure projects, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the governor of a state that shares a border with Canada or Mexico to designate up to 5% of its apportionment of surface transportation program funds for each fiscal year for border infrastructure projects.
